body_html:
@kahkeng: I believe you should look at the syslog to see if a OOM killer is in action, which would explain.

Bazel tries to use all the available memory and CPU to schedule as many action as possible but the resource estimation is currently broken which might explain why --local_resources works.

body:
@kahkeng: I believe you should look at the syslog to see if a OOM killer is in action, which would explain.

Bazel tries to use all the available memory and CPU to schedule as many action as possible but the resource estimation is currently broken which might explain why --local_resources works.
